CustomField.formula: Additional_Information__c & IF(Venue__c <> Course__r.Main_Venue__c, IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Parent_Host__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK( Venue__r.Host__c )), IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Parent_Host__c )), IF(ISPICKVAL(Type__c, 'Reunion') && ISPICKVAL(Status__c , 'Confirmed'), "This session will be held in a private home.", "" ), "This session will be held at the Course Leader's home. " & Venue__r.Town__c & LEFT(Venue__r.Postcode__c,LEN(Venue__r.Postcode__c) - FIND(" ", Venue__r.Postcode__c)) & "." ), "This session will be held at " & Venue__r.Name & " " & Venue__r.Town__c & " " & Venue__r.County__c & " " & LEFT(Venue__r.Postcode__c,LEN(Venue__r.Postcode__c) - FIND(" ", Venue__r.Postcode__c)) & "." ), "" )
CustomField.label: Additional Information with Venue
